title: Really Laggy Client
body:
Good ideas riot thanks but, 
The interface is really laggy and sluggush but other then that great client

replies.body:
Compared to the legacy client, the alpha is way better in terms of 'lag'. In my case I am not experiencing lag, if anything it is better now than what it was 6 months ago and it has only improved (Well done Riot, you are doing some amazing things and work really hard). If anything just wait until beta and lag wont be a problem, if you think its a big problem now then report the bug. This is the first time I am hearing about client lag. 

-RK
